subject: Olympic Games (2012)

Homosexuality
Discrimination
Gymnastics
lead_paragraph: Peter Vidmar stepped down Friday as the chief of mission for the 2012 United States Olympic team after a controversy about his public opposition to same-sex marriage.
snippet: Peter Vidmar stepped down Friday as the chief of mission for the 2012 United States Olympic team after a controversy about his public opposition to same-sex marriage.
